overview: "Ruby's Studio: The Safety Show" offers kids language and tools to keep themselves safe with an empowering, non-fearful approach. Through adorable animation, original music and DIY crafts, beloved host Ruby gently introduces kids to these essential safety tools: Trust Your "Uh-Oh Feeling", Check First before going anywhere unexpected, Get Smart About Getting Lost and Be the Boss of Your Body.
title: Ruby's Studio: The Safety Show
